samophis.lavalink.client.jda

Class LavaClientManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • samophis.lavalink.client.jda.LavaClientManager

  • public class LavaClientManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the manager used to initialize shards, easily build LavaClient instances and cache/remove them.

    Note: It's VERY important to initialize a shard before it is built so that LavaClient-JDA can intercept the READY Event.

    Since:
    0.1

    • Method Detail

      • buildLavaClient

        @Nonnull
public static samophis.lavalink.client.entities.LavaClient buildLavaClient(@Nonnegative
                                                                                     long user_id,
                                                                                     @Nonnegative
                                                                                     int shard_count)
        Used to create and cache a very simple LavaClient instance.
        Parameters:
        user_id - The positive Bot ID.
        shard_count - The positive Shard Count (starting from 1).
        Returns:
        A not-null, cached and very simple LavaClient instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the provided User ID or Shard Count were negative.

      • addLavaClient

        @Nonnull
public static samophis.lavalink.client.entities.LavaClient addLavaClient(@Nonnull
                                                                                   samophis.lavalink.client.entities.LavaClient client)
        Used to cache a manually-configured LavaClient instance.
        Parameters:
        client - A not-null LavaClient instance.
        Returns:
        The provided LavaClient instance, now cached.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the provided LavaClient instance was null.

      • removeLavaClient

        @Nullable
public static samophis.lavalink.client.entities.LavaClient removeLavaClient(@Nonnegative
                                                                                       long user_id)
        Attempts to remove the LavaClient instance associated with the provided User ID from the cache.

        If found, this will shut-down the LavaClient instance and return it. If not found, nothing will happen and null will be returned.

        Parameters:
        user_id - The positive Bot ID.
        Returns:
        A possibly-null LavaClient instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the provided User ID was negative.

      • initShard

        @Nonnull
public static net.dv8tion.jda.core.JDABuilder initShard(@Nonnull
                                                                  samophis.lavalink.client.entities.LavaClient client,
                                                                  @Nonnull
                                                                  net.dv8tion.jda.core.JDABuilder builder)
        Adds a ClientInitializer to a JDABuilder so that it can intercept the READY, VOICE_STATE_UPDATE and VOICE_SERVER_UPDATE Events.
        Parameters:
        client - A not-null LavaClient instance.
        builder - A not-null JDABuilder instance.
        Returns:
        The provided and updated JDABuilder instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If any of the provided parameters were null.

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()
        Attempts to shut-down and remove every single LavaClient instance from the cache.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the manager has already been shut-down.
